title: ğŸ” Local CI/CD Lab Environment on M1 Mac
description: This document describes the setup of a fully local CI/CD lab environment on an Apple M1 Mac (16GB RAM) using Jenkins, Nexus, SonarQube, GitLab (local), Minikube, and Helm for Kubernetes deployments.
